name: MartianArts
tag_list: videos, web, design, games, apps, development, marketing, production, audiovisual, video
overview:
MARTIAN ARTS is a Boston-based production company, specializing in videos, app & game development, web design, marketing and content development.

But enough about MARTIAN ARTS already. Let’s talk about you.

You want to reach people, you want to connect with them. Whether it’s to sell your product, promote an event, share your content, brand your identity or brag about how cute your kitty is, that’s the common denominator. To connect with people.

Now, how are you planning to do that?

Humankind began began around a ﬁre, sharing stories. Ads are skipped. Campaigns are overlooked. Trends are forgotten. But stories captivate us. Stories become part of our culture, a part of us.

That is why MARTIAN ARTS is a group of top notch multimedia storytellers, getting you the same attention as when someone tells a story around a ﬁre, at night. And through new technologies and tailored strategies, MARTIAN ARTS can light a fire around the entire world so that everyone can listen to your story.

MARTIAN ARTS is one letter away from MARTIAL ARTS, harboring skill, balance, grace and strength.

MARS is one planet away from EARTH, providing an outsider’s perspective, a gaze that turns everyday things into new, exciting scenarios.

MARTIAN ARTS is one email away from being your long-term partner.
